text: læa sing dı thi xallxhˌ thrng hı rx sul khxng phraxngkh yud ma di cak chaw meuxng(phwk kuffar)pen siththi khx ngxallxhˌ læa rx sul læa yati snith læa dek kaphra læa phu khadsn læa phu deinthang pheux man ca midi hmunweiyn xyu nı rahwang phu mangmi khxng phwk cea theanan læa xan dı thi than di ham phwk cea k cng lawen seiy phwk cea cng ya ke rng xallxhˌ theid thæ cring xallxhˌ pen phuthrng khemngwd nı kar lngthosʹ
